description: This file defines the MessageWrapper class, which is a wrapper around Message objects for IPC messaging. It manages message-specific metadata and string representations, supporting multiple programming language targets (Java, C).

classes.name: MessageWrapper
classes.description: A wrapper class for Message objects that provides utility functions and manages message representations for IPC communication.

methods.name: MessageWrapper
methods.description: Constructor initializing the wrapper with a Message object and setting language support options.

methods.name: getVariable
methods.description: Returns null as it's not applicable for IPC Messages.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Provides a string representation of the message with its ID and parameters.

methods.name: getMessage
methods.description: Returns the underlying Message object associated with this wrapper.
